scripts.start:dev: npm run build:dev --workspace=client && npm run start:dev --workspace=server
scripts.start:watch: NODE_ENV=local concurrently 'npm run start:watch --workspace=server' 'npm run start:watch --workspace=client'
scripts.start:test: NODE_ENV=test concurrently 'npm run start:watch --workspace=server' 'npm run start:watch --workspace=client' 'cypress open'
